Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Effective July 1,2008, Rensselaer adopted the FASB Interpretation No.48 ("FIN48"), Accounting for Uncertainty in Income Taxes-an interpretation of SFAS No.109, Accounting for Income Taxes. The adoption did not have a material effect on the financial statements.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Part V, Line 4: Intended uses of the endowment fund.
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Income earned on Rensselaer's endowment provides support to students through scholarships, fellowships and prizes. In addition, income is used to provide support to the Institute in the form of professorships, lectures, departmental programs and institutional initiatives.

IRS990ScheduleE.PubViaBroadcastMediaExpln: The Institute shall be open to all students who are qualified according to its admission standards, barring no one on the basis of race, color, creed, national origin, age, religion, marital status, veteran status, disability, sex, or sexual orientation. Efforts shall be made to seek out and admit students of diverse socioeconomic backgrounds whose potential could be reached through a Rensselaer education.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Grantmaker's Description of How Grants are Used
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Administration, monitoring and oversight of grants is conducted to oversee the progress and completion of the grants , ensuring compliance with all relevant terms and conditions.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Identifier: Sch J, Part III, Additional Information
Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: Part 1, line 4a-Severance payments in the amount of $22,500 were provided to Robert Schlesinger, Vice President for Institute Advancement.Part 1, line 4b-Rensselaer has established a nonqualified deferred compensation plan under section 457(f) of the Internal Revenue Code for the purpose of retaining Rensselaer's President. The terms and conditions include a substantial risk of forfeiture should the current President separate prior to her agreed upon date of separation.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.ReturnReference: Part I, Line 7: Non-Fixed payments not listed above
Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: Performance bonuses that are provided to Rensselaer's President are awarded on a discretionary basis based on the accomplishments toward key initiatives of the Rensselaer Plan.The Chief Investment Officer received incentive based bonus on investment performance measured against benchmarks established by the Investment Committee of the Board of Trustees and in accordance with a written compensation agreement.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.ReturnReference: Part I, Line 1a: Relevant information in regards to selections on 1a.

IssuerName.BusinessNameLine1: City of Troy Capital Resource Corporation
City of Troy Capital Resource Corporation

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Conflict of Interest policy is available via Rensselaer's website. The disclosure of governing documents and financial statements are made available to the public upon request.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15b: Compensation Review and Approval Process for Officers and Key Employees
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: 15(a & b) Rensselaer uses the following to establish the compensation of CEO/Executive Directors Officers and Key Employees: Compensation committee, Independent compensation consultant, Form 990 of other organizations, Compensation survey or study and Approval by the board or compensation committee.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Rensselaer conducts an annual survey of all faculty and staff to elicit any Conflict of Interest or commitments. Once the survey is completed, a review of potential conflicts of interest and commitments are reviewed by an Institute-wide committee. If a conflict of interest or commitment is determined, the conflict of interest or commitment is either managed or eliminated.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11: Form 990 Review Process
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Form 990 is provided to the Board of Trustees prior to filing via a secure website.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part III, Line 4d : Other Program Services Description
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 4: AUXILIARYNumber of housing units available: dorm rooms 2,626 single apts 757 married apts 93Number of students on siz. meals: 2,712 OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 5: Other Program Services include activities that further Rensselaer's exempt purpose.
